snippet: Silvio Berlusconi agreed to back the Northern League’s federalist agenda and said he would not become prime minister if the alliance won.
abstract: Former Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi and Roberto Maroni of Northern League say that they will join forces for national and regional elections and that neither man will be prime minister if their alliance wins.
lead_paragraph: Silvio Berlusconi agreed to back the Northern League’s federalist agenda and said he would not become prime minister if the alliance won.

headline.seo: Berlusconi Joins Coalition for Italy’s Next Election
headline.main: Ex-Prime Minister Joins Coalition for Italy’s Next Election
headline.print_headline: Italy: Berlusconi Returns, in a Supporting Role
